items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible logging library. This logger supports multiple log levels and allows for easy extension and integration into any project.
items.title: ecopages/logger: A lightweight, flexible logging library. This logger supports multiple log levels and allows for easy extension and integration into any project.

items.content_html: This repository contains a lightweight web API built using Node.js and TypeScript, developed without relying on any external frameworks.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: A feature-rich portal to chat with GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, & OpenAI Assistant APIs via a lightweight Node.js web app; supports customizable multimodality for voice, images, & files.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
